TopicTitle: The mangled up History Blender Game

Articles.Content: The PC was invented by Sony in 2001.

In late 1940, a young woman known only as "Das Chobit", strapped on full combat gear, her M35 helmet and grabbed her Kar98K... then proceeded to swim the English Channel, run from Dover to London, march into White Hall and single-handedly force the British surrender

In late 1940, a young woman known only as "Das Chobit", strapped on full combat gear, her M35 helmet and grabbed her Kar98K... then proceeded to swim the English Channel, run from Dover to London, march into White Hall and single-handedly force the British surrender

A member of the home guard breaks into the proceeding just before the surrender with a rusty, 23 year old shotgun. Das Chobit yanked the shotgun out of his arms and shot it into his face. Unfortunately, the shotgun misfired and killed Das Chobit. These events are now referred to by history as the Chobit incidence.

[The Cocos (Keeling) Islands] were founded in 1857 when the British Captain William Keeling landed there. Oustroilia quickly took the opportunity to annex it, and set to work on shipping people there. As the British Reich also believed they had a partial claim to the land, they sent frequent ships such as the HMS Papadum.

By 1898, the population had increased to 190 due to colonists arriving there in hope of a new life. Many children were also being born, such as Onions. Due to a transcription error on the ship registry, many Chinese people had also accidently colonised the area.

During Europe War I, a battle broken out over the Cocos (Keeling) Islands. On one side was the HMS Nemesis, and on the other side was the Prussian "Trade Vessel" Base. The battle was fierce, and almost depopulated the entire islands - including the death of John Keeling. Only 45 people survived, because they were having a party on North Keeling Island. Luckily for the existence of the Cocos (Keeling) Islands, William Victor Albert William von Albert was immensely popular with the ladies, causing immigration to increase by up to 501%.

Life continued as normal until World War I.

From a personal project of mine, the history of the Cocos (Keeling) Islands.

A member of the home guard breaks into the proceeding just before the surrender with a rusty, 23 year old shotgun. Das Chobit yanked the shotgun out of his arms and shot it into his face. Unfortunately, the shotgun misfired and killed Das Chobit. These events are now referred to by history as the Chobit incidence.

This was also refered to as "The Revolution" in Dr. Martin DeGrasse Kennedy XIV's speech to the Flying Spaghetti Monster in the year 1010, saying that "Today is a great day. Das Chobit, the evil dictator of the whole world, has now been killed. We said to her "Tear Down This Wall!", but she refused. So we found her and turned her into roadkill stew. Let us hope that a dicatorship like this never happens again on Jupiter, our home planet."

This was also refered to as "The Revolution" in Dr. Martin DeGrasse Kennedy XIV's speech to the Flying Spaghetti Monster in the year 1010, saying that "Today is a great day. Das Chobit, the evil dictator of the whole world, has now been killed. We said to her "Tear Down This Wall!", but she refused. So we found her and turned her into roadkill stew. Let us hope that a dicatorship like this never happens again on Jupiter, our home planet."

But shortly after, followers of Das Chobit assassinated Dr. Martin DeGrasse Kennedy XIV, and the capital of the U.S., London, became a battlefield. Followers of Das Chobit and the U.S. military clashed in what would be known as the The Battle of the Taco Bell.

Edited May 16, 2013 by FallingIntoBlack

The Civil War was fought in 1776 during the great depression, with The Black Plague being a major problem at the time. The Japanese and The 6th Doctor battle for 3 months. The Berlin Wall was toppled one day after the Japanese surrender.

After the Berlin Wall was toppled, the Axis forces of America started working to build a Nuclear bomb. In the great year of 12, Nikola Einstein fashioned a nuclear bomb out of a Cigarette packet and a 1040 Tax Form, Using the Cigarette Packet as the Casing and using the 1040 Tax Form as the source of Radioactive Material. The totally safe process of extracting Radioactive materials from a 1040 tax form was pioneered by Albert Tesla, a visionary who thought it would be possible to create wireless lightbulbs. However, Nikola Einstein perfected the procedure, making it possible for the average Joe to extract as much as 45 Megatons of Radioactive Materials from the Tax Form via a Cuisinart Blender equipped with the Extra Fine Blade.

A bomb similar to this was used was used in World War MMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMX, but a piece of Junk Mail was used as a Radioactive Material source.
